com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.impl

Class RestfulNameValueModelMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.ModelMap
      • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.RestfulModelMap
        • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.impl.RestfulNameValueModelMap

  • public class RestfulNameValueModelMap
extends RestfulModelMap

    Concrete implementation of RestfulModelMap representing a domain model instance mapped to a RESTful web service resource for name-value pair message types.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 03/21/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
